title: Walgreens to Invest $5.2 Billion in VillageMD
sub_head: Pharmacy chain to take a controlling stake in the primary-care network as it seeks to remodel itself as a healthcare provider
body:
Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc. will pay $5.2 billion to acquire a controlling stake in primary-care network VillageMD as the pharmacy chain seeks to remodel itself as a healthcare provider.
The drugstore operator already owns a stake in VillageMD after agreeing last summer to pay VillageMD $1 billion in equity and debt over the three years in exchange for a 30% stake in the Chicago-based startup.
